<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Echoing Channel](/Feats.aspx?ID=306) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 127 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

When you pull forth positive or negative energy, you also create a smaller pocket of that energy. If the next action you use is to cast a 2-action [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) to heal or damage a single creature, choose one additional creature adjacent to either you or the target. Target that creature with a 1-action version of the same spell. This spell is the same level as the 2-action _harm_ or _heal_ you cast and doesn’t cost another spell slot.
name: Echoing Channel
